text: Boye bazali kozela sé etumbu naye? Mokolo moye etumbu naye ekoyaka, baye babosanaki liboso bakolobaka: Batindami ya Nkolo wa biso bayaki na bosôló, boye na mokolo mwa lelo tozali na basungi baye bakosungaka biso? To, tozongisama na mokili tosala maye tozalaki kosala liboso te! Basilaki komizangisa bango moko, mpe maye bazalaki kosala ya mabe ebungisaki bango
